page.title: 13CLUBS IN KINNEFF
page.content:
{THE LUNCHEON CLUB,}started by Kinneff church,is held every Wednesday. It is open to senior citizens in and around the Kinneff area. The club was started four years ago. The club members meet for a few hours to have lunch, play cards or dominoes and listen to music. Sometimes they go off on trips or have films shown. Six ladies from the village help out at the club.
{KINNEFF YOUTH CLUB}was formed four months ago. It is open to all school age children and teenagers. It meets every Sunday in the village hall from 6p.m._9p.m. There are 26 members in the club. They meet to play snooker, table tennis,darts or computer games. The club is run by a local parent with a committee of elected club members. They are saving money to buy more equipment.
